entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet command not found MAC OS #20629
  • WebView error if we leave page while it's navigating #20627
  • Activity class {com.companyname.polnk/companyname.mymauiapp.activity} does not exist. #20626
  • [Testing] Update to latest RC.5 of Appium #20624
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Testing] Template tests xharness issues #20623
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid - Allow `window.open()` from JavaScript to automatically open a `WebView` #20622
    Backlog
  • GeoLocation.GetLocationAsync() failing on sequential calls after initially getting the location. #20620
    Backlog
  • Support compiled bindings for generic ViewModels #20616
    .NET 8 SR4
  • CollectionView selecteditem background lost if collectionview (or parent) IsEnabled changed. #20615
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20614
    Backlog
  • Webview on iOS and Android does not allow local HTML to load additional resources #20613
  • Disconnecting Map Handler causes Map to crash on second page entrance and moving to region. #20612
    Backlog
  • It's impossible to change the scroll position when starting the application. #20611
    Backlog
  • GraphicsView EndInteraction Event dont show which Touchpoint has been ended #20609
  • Custom CommandProperty always null on binding #20608
  • TemplatedCell.UpdateSelectionColor() Object reference not set to an instance of an object error #20607
  • [iOS] NullReferenceException in TemplatedCell #20606
    Backlog
  • Splash Screen Image doesn't fit across devices with different Android Versions #20605
  • Splash Screen does not update iOS #20604
  • No content inside PDF which is loaded in Customwebview in MAUI application on Android #20603

Closed

  • Allow Changing AppShell at runtime #20628
  • Getting AOT/Precompiling error when building in release mode [Android] #20602
  • TableView with Picker #5924
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Shell.Current.FlyoutIsPresented = true still does not toggle the first time on Android #20549
  • Problems with .NET Maui Hybrid Blazor Foreground Service #20303
  • [ci] Xharness fails to install application to run Device Tests and UITests #20107
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Keyboard covers content at bottom of screen in a ScrollView #20200
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] Sticky header panel covers content in a scrollview when using ReturnType="Next" on Entry fields #19956
  • iOS Linker removes support for PCLCrypto.SymmetricKeyAlgorithmProvider.GetAlgorithm #20583
  • XamlC XC0022 error : Binding could be compiled if x:DataType is specified. #20568
  • "Codesign exited with code 1" issue when try to build an iOS app using visual studio 2022 for mac, Rider and VS Code #20530
  • MAUI maps in .net 8 causes error on IOS CAMetalLayer ignoring invalid setDrawableSize width=0.000000 height=0.000000 #20355
  • Window was already activated #20408

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
  • [XC] Allow generic types in x:DataType and x:Type #20625
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer return actual detected directions #20619
    community ✨
  • [UITest] Re-enable iOS Scrolling tests #20618
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • Only run delete if files exist #20617
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • Add the multi-project template #20365
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] Adjust Keyboard Scrolling for Sticky Headers and Fix Bottom Content Inset #20562
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • [CI] Fix template to get it back to work with the megapipeline. #20587
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [XC] split warnings on ',' and ';' #20578
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures

Updated

  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • Add animated GIF support for Image on iOS #19411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, stale, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Stand up UI testing on iOS platforms #20541
    area/testing
  • Enable now passing tests and add some TableView categories #20531
    area/testing, area/ListView
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
